header.title: Sami spell checking in MacOS X

section.title: Sami spell checking in MacOS X (Snow Leopard)
section.p: If you install the North, Lule and South Sami hunspell dictionaries, you can get system wide spelling support for these languages.
Download and unzip our hunspell dictionaries and follow the instructions and voilá, you get system wide sami spell checking.
